-C.value: try { Use-Icinga -Minimal; } catch { Write-Output 'The Icinga PowerShell Framework is either not installed on the system or not configured properly. Please check https://icinga.com/docs/windows for further details'; exit 3; }; Exit-IcingaExecutePlugin -Command 'Invoke-IcingaCheckScheduledTask'

2.description:
A list of tasks to check for. If your tasks contain spaces, wrap them around a ' to ensure they are
properly handled as string
2.caption: TaskName

5.description: Increase the printed output message by adding additional details or print all data regardless of their status
5.caption: Verbosity

4.description: Set this argument to not write any performance data
4.caption: NoPerfData

3.description: The state a task should currently have for the plugin to return [OK]
3.caption: State
